DOC.brief_summary: Nutrimemo aim study effect daily consumption mix vitamin A long chain n-3 Polyunsaturated Fatty Acids ( PUFA ) evolution cognitive function healthy elderly subject . The study randomize , double bind , parallel-groups ( 2 arm ) placebo-controlled design .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Lipidic Nutrients Memory Well Being Healthy Aging Adults
DOC.detailed_description: This project aim investigate effect 12 month supplementation mix Vitamin A + Long chain n-3 PUFA v placebo consume daily human cognitive function . Food supplement placebo provide capsule match appearance . The study conduct randomize , double-blind , parallel-groups ( 2 arm ) placebo-controlled . Two group , 180 volunteer , recruit . One group volunteer consume Vitamin A + Long chain n-3 PUFA mix one consume placebo product . Each volunteer see 5 visit investigational site . Baseline last follow-up visit include cognitive assessment CANTAB battery . CANTAB test cover several aspect memory : visio-spatial learn episodic memory , visio-spatial work memory , frontal executive function , also word-based semantic memory . Moreover , psychological mood component evaluate ( mnesic complaint , depression , fatigue ) . Physical activity also record . Finally , biological parameter assess ( lipid profile , glycemia , CRP , thyroid stimulate hormone , transthyretin , plasma level vitamin A D well retinol bind protein lipidic profile ) .
DOC.criteria: Independent subject Living home non diagnose Alzheimer Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 2030 kg/m2 ( limit include ) ; 26 < MMSE score ≤ 29 Logical memory subtest Wechsler Memory Scale ( 1669 year battery ) subscores comply follow : Immediate recall score < 29 ; Delayed recall score < 16 ; Evidence actual major depressive disorder accord module A Mini International Neuropsychiatric Interview ( MINI ) ; Subject consume food supplement likely effect memory within less 6 month ; Subject consume high level Vitamin A and/or Long chain n3 PUFA evaluate food frequency questionnaire , Restrictive unbalance diet ( hypocaloric , vegetarian , vegan , … ) selfdeclared V0 ; Alcohol consumption > 4 glasses/day Diabetes ; Cardiovascular disease diagnose within less 2 year , follow exception : subject control ( medicate ) high blood pressure and/ control ( medicate ) include ; Unbalanced thyroid disease ; Antidepressant treatment stop since less 3 month still ongoing ; Personal history schizophrenia psychiatric disorder ; Ongoing neuroleptic treatment ; Uncorrected visual auditory dysfunction ( accord volunteer 's selfdeclaration ) ; Life threaten pathology ( cancer ) remission less 1 year still ongoing ; General anesthesia last 6 month plan next 6 month ; Documented food allergy ( y ) , namely one component study product ; Psychological linguistic incapability sign inform consent .
